Entries.pamHouseUpgrade: So, you upgraded that old trailer to a full-on house... that's nice. Would've been nicer if Pam could've enjoyed it, though.$s
Entries.pamHouseUpgradeAnonymous: Someone upgraded that old trailer to a full-on house... that's nice. Would've been nicer if Pam could've enjoyed it, though.$s

Entries.Wed8: I guess I've grown attached to Jas. Feels like I have a family... a weird family, but still.#$e#I never really had much of a family as a kid.$s
Entries.Fri4: $d Joja#What's the point of life if all you do is work?|I haven't been able to pay my rent, but whoever is controlling Marnie's estate is letting me stay anyway. I'm lucky, I guess.
Entries.Sat4: $d Joja#I'm renting my room at a really good price. It's small but I can't complain.|If I could reset my life maybe I'd start a chicken farm. Only free-range eggs of course.
Entries.Sat8: I've really grown attached to Marnie's chickens. Well, I guess they're mine now, aren't they? I'll treat them well.$h

Entries.marriage_Fri.002: If I don't order a cold one now and then, this place'll go out of business. I'm just doing my civic duty. I'll head home around 10.

Entries.Rainy_Day_0: I hope Jas is doing alright without me.#$e#I'm not too worried... she's old enough now to take care of the animals on her own.
Entries.fall_15: I'll be helping Jas with the animals at tomorrow's fair, like usual. You should just kick back and have some fun.$6
